message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $11,500 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm ready to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. How about $11,000?  I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,750, which is a fair price for both of us.  Let's make this deal happen.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,750 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,900 as a final compromise.  This is a fair price considering the value this product will bring to your business. What do you say?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,900 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,800. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can finalize this deal.
